text: A Reason to Breathe is an EP by the rock band The Esoteric. It was self- released in 2002, and more recently made available via BandCamp. ==Track listing== Adapted from album sleeve"A Reason to Breathe" album sleeve and Discogs. # "Our Best Elvis Yet" # "Strategy Of Luck" # "Worth The Wait" # "Eye Child" # "Flight Of The Botfly" ==References== ==External links== * The Esoteric official website Category:2002 EPs Category:The Esoteric albums Category:Self-released EPs
title: A Reason to Breathe
